abstract: The Canon D50 records to a mini-DVD but uses a 5.39-megapixel picture sensor to improve the picture quality.
snippet: The Canon D50 records to a mini-DVD but uses a 5.39-megapixel picture sensor to improve the picture quality.
lead_paragraph: There are two kinds of camcorder users: those who like to record on tape for the picture quality, and those who like DVD and digital recording for the ease of viewing.

headline.main: A Palm-Size DVD Camcorder and a Handful of Ambition
headline.print_headline: A Palm-Size DVD Camcorder and a Handful of Ambition

abstract: David D. French, chief executive of the chip maker Cirrus Logic, has resigned over his involvement in the company’s past stock option grant practices, the company said on Wednesday. Michael L. Hackworth, the former chief executive and current chairman, will be acting chief of the company he helped found, Cirrus said in announcing the results of an internal inquiry.
lead_paragraph: David D. French, chief executive of the chip maker Cirrus Logic, has resigned over his involvement in the company’s past stock option grant practices, the company said on Wednesday. Michael L. Hackworth, the former chief executive and current chairman, will be acting chief of the company he helped found, Cirrus said in announcing the results of an internal inquiry.

headline.main: Cirrus Logic Chief Resigns Over Options
